All functions

Aggregate bin summary counts into a matrix of counts format

  • aggregate_bin_counts

Club signatures from the two strands to remove strand bias

  • club_signature_counts

Function to check if the signatures should be clubbed

  • club_signature_validation_plot

Summarize the mutationFileFormat data into bins along the read length

  • damage_build_bin_counts

Calculates slope of the damage/mutational pattern from ends of reads

  • damage_slope_calc

Builds damage logo plots along with mutational profile across read and the strand break composition for the clusters

  • damageLogo_pos_str

Builds damage logo plots along with mutational profile across read for the clusters

  • damageLogo_pos

Builds damage logo plots for the clusters

  • damageLogo

Function to extract signature counts of mutations occurring only upto a certain position along the genome

  • filter_signatures_by_location

Function to extract signature counts for position along the read

  • filter_signatures_only_location

Function to extract signature counts only for a specific substitution pattern

  • filter_signatures_per_substitution

Function to extract counts for only mutation with no flanking bases.

  • filter_signatures_w_mutation

Function to extract counts for only mutatiosignatures without position information

  • filter_signatures_wo_location

Function to perform grid plots of PCA for signature counts with position information from multiple data sources

  • gridPCA_position_signatures_combo

Function to perform grid plots of PCA for signature counts

  • gridPCA_signatures

Plot mutation signature patterns across read length

  • pattern_plot_full

Plot mutation signature patterns across read length

  • pattern_plot

Computes strand break composition for mutation signatures at the extremes

  • strand_breaks_composition
